snippet: AMES--Steven. The Trustees, Faculty, Students, and Staff of the Mount Sinai Health System mourn the passing of our wonderful friend, dedicated philanthropist, and former Trustee Steven Ames. Steven served as a member of the Boards of Trustees, following in the footsteps of his late mother, Harriett Annenberg Ames, from 1973 to 1987 and, along with his family, generously endowed programs including cardiology, scholarship, pediatric fellowships, and pulmonary care. The family's tradition of support also includes the Annenberg Building of the Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai. We extend our heartfelt condolences to his beloved wife, Ann, their children and grandchildren, and the entire Ames and Annenberg families. Peter W. May, Chairman of the Boards of Trustees; Kenneth L. Davis, M.D., President and CEO; Dennis S. Charney, M.D., Anne and Joel Ehrenkranz Dean, Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai and President for Academic Affairs, Mount Sinai Health System 1/3
